client_name.description: Name of the Client to be presented to the End-User.

redirect_uris.description: Array of Redirection URI values used by the Client. One of these registered Redirection URI values MUST exactly match the redirect_uri parameter value used in each Authorization Request.

client_uri.description: URL of the home page of the Client. The value of this field MUST point to a valid Web page.

policy_uri.description: URL that the Relying Party Client provides to the End-User to read about the how the profile data will be used. The value of this field MUST point to a valid web page.

tos_uri.description: URL that the Relying Party Client provides to the End-User to read about the Relying Party's terms of service. The value of this field MUST point to a valid web page.

clientId.description: The unique ID for the OAuth client, created by Synapse

clientSecret.description: The shared secret used to exchange an access code for an access token.  Returned only during initial client creation.
